alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 13 at 3:25AM CDT until July 13 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 479 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST KANSAS CHEROKEE CRAWFORD IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSOURI HOWELL OREGON SHANNON TEXAS IN SOUTHWEST MISSOURI BARRY CHRISTIAN DOUGLAS JASPER LAWRENCE MCDONALD NEWTON OZARK STONE TANEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALTON, ANDERSON, AURORA, AVA, BAXTER SPRINGS, BENDAVIS, BIRCH TREE, BRANSON, CARTHAGE, CASSVILLE, CHICOPEE, CHRISTIAN CENTER, COLUMBUS, COUCH, CRANE, DOGWOOD, EDGEWATER BEACH, ELSEY, FORSYTH, GOODHOPE, GOODMAN, GREER, HOLLISTER, HUGGINS, INDIAN POINT, JOPLIN, KIMBERLING CITY, KIRBYVILLE, LONE OAK, LOWELL, MADRY, MARIONVILLE, MONETT, MONTIER, MOUNT VERNON, NEOSHO, NEUTRAL, NIXA, NOEL, OZARK, OZARK BEACH, PINEVILLE, PITTSBURG, PLATO, POMONA, POTTERSVILLE, POWERSITE, RIVERTON, ROBY, ROCKY COMFORT, ROME, SELMORE, SHERWIN, SILOAM SPRINGS, SILVER DOLLAR CITY, SOUTH FORK, SOUTH WEST CITY, SQUIRES, STIPPVILLE, TERESITA, THAYER, THOMASVILLE, VANZANT, WASOLA, WEST PLAINS, WHITE CHURCH, WILDERNESS, AND WINONA.
